alert.note: Alert for Chuska Mountains; Estancia Valley; Guadalupe County; Northeast Highlands; Northwest Highlands; Santa Fe Metro Area; West Central Highlands; West Central Mountains; West Central Plateau (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 19 at 3:21AM MDT until April 19 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Estancia Valley, Guadalupe County, Northwest Highlands, Santa Fe Metro Area, Northeast Highlands, Chuska Mountains, West Central Highlands, West Central Mountains and West Central Plateau. * WHEN...From Noon today to 7 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong cross winds on area roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Localized areas of blowing dust may reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Chuska Mountains; Estancia Valley; Guadalupe County; Northeast Highlands; Northwest Highlands; Santa Fe Metro Area; West Central Highlands; West Central Mountains; West Central Plateau
